com.skyisland.questmanager.player.skill.event

Class MagicApplyEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.event.Event
      • com.skyisland.questmanager.player.skill.event.MagicApplyEvent

  • public class MagicApplyEvent
extends org.bukkit.event.Event
    Thrown when a QuestPlayer's spell is applying a SpellEffect

      • getHandlerList

        public static org.bukkit.event.HandlerList getHandlerList()

      • getPlayer

        public QuestPlayer getPlayer()

      • setPlayer

        public void setPlayer(QuestPlayer player)

      • getDamage

        public double getDamage()
        Gets the base amount of damage being done. If this were healing, it would be negative.

      • setDamage

        public void setDamage(double damage)
        Sets the base amount of damage being done. This is not intended to be changed for simple 'bonus damage' adjustments. For that, see setModifiedDamage(double)

      • getModifiedDamage

        public double getModifiedDamage()
        Returns the current amount of bonus damage being dealt to the target. This includes negative amounts for damage penalties.

      • setModifiedDamage

        public void setModifiedDamage(double modifiedDamage)
        Sets the damage modifier for the event. This includes bonuses and penalties to damage

      • getEfficiency

        public double getEfficiency()
        Gets the current efficiency of the event. This is a multiplicitive bonus/penalty done after modifications

      • setEfficiency

        public void setEfficiency(double efficiency)
        Sets the efficiency the event will be executed at. This is the final modification done, and is multiplicitive (e.g. efficiency 1 does 100% of damage)

      • getFinalDamage

        public double getFinalDamage()
        Performs all calculations with given parameters to determine the final damage dealt. This calculation also does not consider whether or not the attack missed.
        Returns:
        the damage that would be dealt.
